publicwhip.spmotion: * S3M-5607 Cathie Craigie: Going the Extra Mile—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Going the Extra Mile: A Strategy for Working with Young People, initiated by Youth Buzz in coalition with North Lanarkshire Council and other partners; believes that the strategy will assist in identifying and assisting vulnerable children, young people and families who need support; commends this strategy for consulting young people across North Lanarkshire; further recognises the great efforts of all Youth Buzz representatives and Members of the Scottish Youth Parliament involved including David Barber, Fiona Beaton, Rebecca Brown and Liam Quigley, all from the Cumbernauld and Kilsyth area, and hopes that the strategy is a success.

S3M-5607 Going the Extra Mile (lodged on 26 January 2010) Elaine Smith*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Rhona Brankin*, Jamie Hepburn*, David Whitton*, Mary Mulligan*, Claire Baker*, Kenneth Gibson*, Karen Whitefield*, Des McNulty*, James Kelly*, Hugh Henry*
